name: Director's Cut: BRITISH AIRWAYS FIRST CLASS | 747-400 | London Heathrow to Chicago O'Hare
description:
WATCH: AZUMA: Britainâ€™s NEW high speed train: https://youtu.be/Y8ti6V73F0c

Fancy being a Patron? https://www.patreon.com/paulstripreports

An improved edit of a previous video. Now with stabilisation and colour correction, and some shortened/added scenes.

This was my first report of BA's First Class product, and the footage is from November 2015.

I travel from London Heathrow to Chicago O'Hare. Featuring the exclusive Concorde Room, the Elemis spa at Heathrow, a special First Class Thanksgiving dinner and afternoon tea. 

A big thank you to my subscribers - next new trip report is coming out this weekend... :-D

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
